method: Heat oil in a skillet and cook chicken until browned. Add minced garlic and red pepper flakes and cook until fragrant. Add soy sauce and Thai basil and cook until sauce thickens.

Mix flour and baking powder in a bowl. In another bowl, whisk together milk and eggs. Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and mix until combined. Fold in blueberries. Cook pancakes on griddle until golden brown.

Saute sliced mushrooms in a large pot until browned. Add arborio rice and stir to coat with oil. Add chicken broth one cup at a time, stirring until absorbed before adding more. Cook until rice is tender. Stir in parmesan cheese and butter until melted and creamy.
